problem_summary_simple: Find the smallest group of people whose combined skills cover all required skills.
problem_summary_technical: Uses dynamic programming with bitmasking to represent skill sets, minimizing team size by iterating through people and updating DP states.
key_insights: Bitmasking is efficient for representing subsets of skills.
Dynamic programming state can be the bitmask of covered skills.
Iterate through people and update DP table by combining current skill sets with the person's skills.
